en: Its business is advancing quite well.

zh: 资本密集型产业不一定是知识密集型产业。

en: Capital, land and labor are the three key factors of production.

en: The game was drawn.

en: The game was not exciting at all.

en: The game will probably be canceled.

en: The game will probably be called off.
zh: 比赛很可能会被取消。

en: The game ended in a victory for B school, which was quite contrary to predictions.
zh: 比赛以B学校的胜利告终，这与之前的预测截然相反。

en: They can't have lost the game.

zh: 当铃声响起时，他会强势开局，卢西亚诺会很快输掉。

en: Trial and error is essential to progress.

en: Some of the college students who are caught cheating on the exams do not even blush.

en: We need to make inquiries about the date of the examination.

en: I'm very busy with the examination just before me.

en: When he took the exam, he tried hard but failed it.

en: There is only a week left before the examination.

en: The examinations will begin on Monday next week.

en: Examinations pose a big problem.

en: The examinations are all over.

en: The examination begins next Monday.

en: Examinations interfere with the real purpose of education.
zh: 考试干扰了教育的真正目的。

en: Examinations interfere with the real meaning of education.
zh: 考试干扰了教育的真正意义。

zh: 考试日期和我姐姐的婚礼冲突了。

en: He's anxious about his examination result.

zh: 别担心你的考试结果。

en: The result of my exams was not what I had expected.

en: He said that he would let us know later about the results of the examination.
zh: 他说他稍后会告诉我们考试结果。

en: I can't ask for the test results. I'm too terrified to hear them.
zh: 我不敢问考试成绩。我太害怕听到结果了。

en: I'll let you know the results of the examination after they are announced.
zh: 成绩公布后我会告诉你考试结果。

zh: 考试迫使我努力学习。

en: In examinations the foolish ask questions that the wise cannot answer.

en: I'm preoccupied with the exam.
zh: 我正忙于准备考试。

en: Failing the examination means waiting for another year.
zh: 考试不及格意味着要再等一年。

en: The names of the students who failed in the examination were posted on the bulletin board.
zh: 考试不及格的学生的名单被贴在公告栏上。

en: You'd better revise history for the exam.
zh: 你最好复习一下历史，准备考试。

en: Study hard so that you can pass the exam.
zh: 努力学习，以便你能通过考试。

en: You have to get 60 marks to pass the exam.
zh: 你必须得到60分才能通过考试。

en: I passed the examination, and I'm going to be an honor student.
zh: 我通过了考试，我要成为一名优秀学生。

en: I studied really hard so as to pass the exam.

en: I studied really hard in order to pass the exam.
zh: 我非常努力地学习，为了通过考试。

en: It is up to you whether you pass the examination or not.
zh: 你是否能通过考试取决于你自己。

en: He failed the exam.
zh: 他考试没及格。

en: You needn't be ashamed because you failed the exam.
zh: 你不必因为考试不及格而感到羞愧。

en: I was able to pass the exam.
zh: 我能够通过考试。

en: I'm confident of passing the examination.
zh: 我有信心通过考试。

en: I'm confident that I'll pass the exam.
zh: 我有信心我会通过考试。

en: I'm sure I'll pass the test.

en: I'll do my best to pass the examination.
zh: 我会尽我最大的努力通过考试。

en: Study to pass the exam.
zh: 努力学习，通过考试。

en: I must work hard to pass the test.
zh: 我必须努力学习才能通过考试。

en: You need not work so hard in order to pass the examination.
zh: 你不需要那么努力学习才能通过考试。

en: I congratulate you on passing the examination.
zh: 我祝贺你通过考试。

en: Because I passed the examination.
zh: 因为我通过了考试。

en: You'll have to work hard if you want to pass the exam.
zh: 如果你想通过考试，你必须努力学习。

en: I wish there were no examination.
zh: 我希望没有考试。

en: It sure would be nice if there were no exam...
zh: 要是不考试就好了...

en: How did the exam go?

en: You must be careful when you write answers in a test.
zh: 考试答题时一定要小心。

en: I made a good shot at the exam.
zh: 我这次考试发挥得不错。

en: I feel ashamed that I got such bad marks in the examination.
zh: 我考试考得这么差，真感到羞愧。

en: We all consider it wrong to cheat in an examination.
zh: 我们都认为考试作弊是不对的。

en: Don't you think it's wrong to cheat on an examination?
zh: 你不觉得考试作弊是不对的吗？

en: Shizuko cheated in an examination and received an appropriate punishment.
zh: 静子考试作弊，受到了应有的惩罚。

en: I will do well on the test.
zh: 我会考好的。

en: The examination is near at hand.
zh: 考试临近了。

en: I was at ease after all the exams were over.
zh: 考完试后，我感到很轻松。

en: I felt like singing loudly when the exam was over.
zh: 考完试后，我真想大声唱歌。

en: We felt happy when the examination was over.
zh: 考试结束后，我们感到很高兴。

en: I am afraid that I shall not be free till the examination is over.
zh: 恐怕要考完试我才能自由。

en: The students went at their work as the examinations approached.
zh: 随着考试的临近，学生们开始努力学习。

en: The examination is approaching.
zh: 考试越来越近了。

en: If it were not for exams, we would be happy.
zh: 如果没有考试，我们会很高兴的。

en: But for exams, our school life would be more fun.
zh: 如果没有考试，我们的学校生活会更有趣。

en: If it were not for examinations, our school life would be happier.
zh: 如果没有考试，我们的学校生活会更快乐。

en: The examination is drawing nearer.
zh: 考试越来越近了。

en: When I can get through my exams, I will take a long vacation.
zh: 考完试后，我要好好休个长假。

en: The examination is close at hand.
zh: 考试就在眼前了。

en: Success in exams doesn't mean a thing to her.
zh: 考试成功对她来说毫无意义。

en: All the vehicles behaved well on their test runs.
zh: 所有车辆在试运行中表现良好。

en: The attempts were for the most part unsuccessful.
zh: 这些尝试大多不成功。

en: I tried writing with my left hand.
zh: 我试着用左手写字。

en: Let's have a go at it.
zh: 咱们试一试吧。

en: Unfortunately the poet died in his youth.
zh: 不幸的是，这位诗人英年早逝。

en: Tests showed that Alex wasn't just mimicking.
zh: 测试表明，亚历克斯不仅仅是在模仿。

en: Poets have compared life to a voyage.
zh: 诗人们将人生比作航行。

en: Poets write poems.
zh: 诗人写诗。

en: Poets often compare death to sleep.
zh: 诗人经常把死亡比作睡眠。

en: The poet expressed his burning passion for the woman he loved.
zh: 诗人表达了他对所爱女人的炽热激情。

en: A poet looks at the world as a man looks at a woman.
zh: 诗人看世界就像男人看女人一样。

en: The poet and scholar is dead.
zh: 这位诗人和学者去世了。

en: As a poet, he flowered in his twenties.
zh: 作为一名诗人，他在二十多岁时才华横溢。

en: The poet Keats belongs to the Romantic school.
zh: 诗人济慈属于浪漫主义流派。

en: The scientist has a love of facts, even isolated facts, similar to the poet's love of words.
zh: 科学家热爱事实，即使是孤立的事实，就像诗人热爱文字一样。

en: Much has already been said about the difficulty of translating poetry.
zh: 关于翻译诗歌的难度，已经说了很多了。

en: It is difficult to translate a poem into another language.
zh: 将一首诗翻译成另一种语言是很困难的。

en: Learning poetry is a good discipline for the memory.
zh: 学习诗歌是对记忆力的一种很好的训练。

en: The crop suffered serious damage as a consequence of the early frost.
zh: 由于早霜，庄稼遭受了严重的损害。

en: Poetry is not in his line.
zh: 诗歌不是他的专长。

en: Poetry is a search for the inexplicable.
zh: 诗歌是对无法解释的事物的探索。

en: Poetry helps to interpret life.
zh: 诗歌有助于诠释生活。

en: How do you interpret these lines of the poem?
zh: 你如何解读这首诗的这些诗句？

en: I don't give a damn about poetry.
zh: 我才不在乎诗歌呢。

en: Poetry is the record of the best and happiest moments of the happiest and best mind.
zh: 诗歌是最好和最幸福的心灵记录下的最好和最幸福的时刻。

en: I have some damage to my vision.
zh: 我的视力有些损伤。

en: I'll check your vision.
zh: 我来检查一下你的视力。

en: Please check my vision.
zh: 请检查我的视力。

en: If you start to go blind, just give a shout.
zh: 如果你开始失明，就喊一声。

en: I have good eyesight.
zh: 我的视力很好。

en: I have normal eyesight.
zh: 我的视力正常。

en: I have poor eyesight.
zh: 我的视力不好。

en: I have bad eyesight.
zh: 我的视力很差。

en: My eyesight is beginning to fail.
zh: 我的视力开始衰退了。

en: Poor sight is a handicap to an athlete.
zh: 视力不好对运动员来说是一种障碍。

en: My eyesight is getting worse.
zh: 我的视力越来越差了。

en: I'm afraid my visual field has narrowed.
zh: 恐怕我的视野变窄了。

en: It seems my field of vision is not as wide as it used to be.
zh: 似乎我的视野不如以前宽阔了。

en: Sight is one of the five senses.
zh: 视觉是五感之一。

en: The eyes themselves can become selective, ignoring part of what is there, and the brain sometimes insists on seeing things that don't exist at all.
zh: 眼睛本身会变得有选择性，忽略掉存在的一部分，而大脑有时会坚持看到根本不存在的东西。

en: The bliss was often interrupted by anxiety.
zh: 幸福常常被焦虑打断。

en: I have something to tell him quickly.
zh: 我有些事要尽快告诉他。

en: An urgent telegram brought her hurrying back to Tokyo.
zh: 一封紧急电报让她匆匆赶回东京。

en: Would you please answer as soon as you can?
zh: 请尽快回复好吗？

en: You had better cut out the fat.
zh: 你最好戒掉肥肉。

en: Ultraviolet rays can cause skin cancer.
zh: 紫外线会导致皮肤癌。

en: Ultraviolet rays are harmful to us.
zh: 紫外线对我们有害。

en: The sudden increase of ultraviolet rays made the researchers believe in the existence of ozone holes.
zh: 紫外线的突然增加使研究人员相信臭氧空洞的存在。

en: A purple carpet will not go with this red curtain.
zh: 紫色地毯和这红色窗帘不搭。

en: I had to leave out this problem for lack of space.
zh: 因为没有空间，我不得不省略这个问题。

en: The paper plane fell slowly to earth.
zh: 纸飞机慢慢地落到地上。

en: I made a paper plane.
zh: 我做了一个纸飞机。

en: Can I have a paper bag?
zh: 能给我一个纸袋吗？

en: Please fetch me a piece of paper.
zh: 请帮我拿一张纸。

en: Please get me a scrap of paper.
zh: 请给我一张纸。

en: May I use some paper?
zh: 我可以拿一些纸用吗？

en: Give me a piece of paper.
zh: 给我一张纸。

en: Paper is made from wood.
zh: 纸是用木头做的。

en: A stapler is very useful for attaching papers together.
zh: 订书机对于把纸张订在一起非常有用。

en: Paper burns easily.
zh: 纸很容易燃烧。

en: Paper was invented by the Chinese.
zh: 纸是中国人发明的。

en: Paper burns quickly.
zh: 纸燃烧得很快。

en: Paper catches fire easily.
zh: 纸很容易着火。

en: Draw a line on your paper.
zh: 在你的纸上画一条线。

en: Draw a line on the paper.
zh: 在纸上画一条线。

en: I filled in my name on the paper.
zh: 我在纸上填了我的名字。

en: The paper was blotted with ink.
zh: 纸被墨水弄脏了。

en: There were ink blots on the paper.
zh: 纸上有墨水污迹。

en: May I use a pencil and some paper?
zh: 我可以借用铅笔和纸吗？

en: I need some paper.
zh: 我需要一些纸。

en: I want some paper.
zh: 我想要一些纸。

en: There is very little paper left, so order some more.
zh: 纸快用完了，所以订购一些。

en: I don't know how to operate a spinning wheel.
zh: 我不知道如何操作纺车。

en: Private detectives were hired to look into the strange case.
zh: 私家侦探受雇调查这起奇怪的案件。

en: The number of private colleges has increased.
zh: 私立大学的数量增加了。

en: How is it in a private school?
zh: 在私立学校怎么样？

en: I failed to get the position I wanted.
zh: 我没能得到我想要的职位。

en: The private detectives accompanied the President everywhere.
zh: 那些私家侦探寸步不离地跟着总统。

en: I traveled at my own expense.
zh: 我自费旅行。

en: I expected him to offer some help.
zh: 我期望他能提供一些帮助。

en: You as well as I are wrong.
zh: 你和我一样都错了。

en: Six of us are going on an excursion to the beach this weekend.
zh: 我们六个人这周末要去海滩郊游。

en: We two became acquainted at a party.
zh: 我们俩在一次聚会上相识。

en: We all have passed the test.
zh: 我们都通过了考试。

en: We were young once, weren't we, Linda?
zh: 琳达，我们都年轻过，不是吗？

en: All of us went to the theater to see a play.
zh: 我们所有人都去剧院看戏了。

en: Not all of us went to the Sapporo Snow Festival.
zh: 并非我们所有人都去了札幌冰雪节。

en: His advice to us was that we should play fair.
zh: 他对我们的建议是，我们应该公平竞争。

en: We are next-door neighbors.
zh: 我们是隔壁邻居。

en: We're neighbours.
zh: 我们是邻居。

en: We often eat lunch together.
zh: 我们经常一起吃午饭。

en: We blamed parents for lack of love.
zh: 我们责怪父母缺乏爱。

en: Our parents should be taken care of.
zh: 我们的父母应该被照顾。

en: We went to Paris in the course of our travels.
zh: 在旅行途中，我们去了巴黎。

en: We cooked egg dishes.
zh: 我们做了鸡蛋菜。

en: We are looking forward to going on a hike next week.
zh: 我们期待着下周去徒步旅行。

en: We are supposed to have a meeting this day week.
zh: 我们下周的今天应该开会。

en: It's been decided that we'll have a meeting a week from today.
zh: 已经决定我们将在下周的今天开会。

en: We will have been married for ten years on this day next week.
zh: 到下周的今天，我们结婚就十年了。

en: We are going on a journey next month.
zh: 我们下个月要去旅行。

en: When we are told not to come, we become all the more eager to go.
zh: 当我们被告知不要来时，我们反而更渴望去。

en: We'll need an extra ten dollars.
zh: 我们需要额外的十美元。
